"Shortcut Words":
"\"Shortcut Words\" are a system that allow you to pre-register useful common phrases so you can say them at-will quickly and easily.

To register Shortcut Words, select \"Chat\" from the main menu, then select \"Shortcut Word Settings\"."
"Once registered, you can access your Shortcut Words from the Quick Menu, or by using the designated Shortcut Word keys on your keyboard."
